data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ukhrul, Manipur, India a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ukhrul, Manipur, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 15,200 souls in Ukhrul and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Ukhrul, Manipur, India to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Ukhrul, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, we ask for 3 new simple churches in the county of Ukhrul, Manipur, India. Place a simple church in every community of the 15,200 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 167 believers in the county of Ukhrul to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Lord, to the people of Ukhrul you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

location.name: Ukhrul
location.people_groups_list: Meitei Thanga, Meitei (Manipur Muslim), Thoubalkonou, Hojai, Barua
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Meitei Thanga (118,000), Meitei (Manipur Muslim) (198,000), Thoubalkonou (1,400), Hojai (4,200), Barua (1,300)
